text: "Give In to Me" is a song by American singer-songwriter Michael Jackson from his 1991 album Dangerous. The song features a powerful rock sound and intense lyrics that convey longing and desire. It showcases Jackson's unique vocal style and features a collaboration with artist and guitarist Slash from Guns N' Roses. The themes of the song revolve around love, passion, and the urge to connect deeply with someone.
title: Give In to Me
